title: Fuel crisis affects Government officers
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Development Officers’ Service Union said that public officers are facing a severe crisis due to the increase in fuel prices.
The General Secretary of the development Officers’ Service Union, Chandana Sooriyarachchi stated that public officers who DO NOT receive any additional allowances are affected by this situation.
He stated that the Government should take steps to provide a quick solution to this situation.
